snippet.title: Viscerafest - Announcement Trailer [Retro FPS]
snippet.description:
Viscerafest is a fast-paced sci-fi fantasy arena FPS coming to PC in 2021! Fight through hordes of aliens and eldritch monstrosities wielding a slew of powerful weapons, juggling your resources, and exploring over 26 intricately designed hand crafted levels.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1406780/Viscerafest/

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#Retro #FPS
